DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether graft anterior vaginal prolapse repair effective associate less complication prolapse repair suture .
DOC.brief_title: Outcomes Anterior Colporrhaphy Versus Graft Reinforced Anterior Prolapse Repair
DOC.detailed_description: Successful correction anterior vaginal prolapse remain one challenging aspects pelvic reconstructive surgery . Up 70 % recurrent prolapse follow anterior colporrhaphy . The low success rate consequently lead widespread use graft anterior vaginal prolapse repair . While biologic graft polyglactin 910 mesh yield disappointing result , uncontrolled study demonstrate low recurrence rate polypropylene mesh reinforcement . The Perigee Transobturator Prolapse Repair System ( Perigee TPRS ) ( American Medical Systems , Minnetonka , Minnesota ) use repair anterior vaginal prolapse via transobturator approach . Specially-designed helical needle utilized attach either porcine dermal ( InteXenTM ) soft polypropylene ( InteProTM ) graft pelvic sidewall four point . We design randomize control trial compare anatomic success rate , effect quality life sexual symptom score , rate adverse event Perigee TPRS polypropylene mesh anterior colporrhaphy .
